meanings.definition: The quality or state of being faded.
meanings.sent1: The fadednesses of the old photograph reminded her of the passage of time.
meanings.sent2: The fadednesses of the painting made it hard to distinguish the original colors.
meanings.sent3: The fadednesses of the memories added a nostalgic touch to the conversation.
meanings.sent4: The fadednesses of the stars in the morning sky hinted at the coming sunrise.
meanings.sent5: The fadednesses of the fabric showed years of wear and tear.

meanings.definition: The condition of losing brightness or color.
meanings.sent1: She noticed the fadednesses of the flowers as they wilted in the vase.
meanings.sent2: The fadednesses of the sunset painted the sky in soft pastel hues.
meanings.sent3: The fadednesses of the rainbow after the storm left a subtle beauty in the sky.
meanings.sent4: The fadednesses of the leaves in autumn signaled the arrival of winter.
meanings.sent5: The fadednesses of the painting gave it a vintage charm.

meanings.definition: The act of becoming less distinct or noticeable.
meanings.sent1: The fadednesses of the writing on the old sign made it hard to read.
meanings.sent2: The fadednesses of the music in the distance hinted at a distant party.
meanings.sent3: The fadednesses of the scent in the room made it difficult to identify.
meanings.sent4: The fadednesses of the footprints in the sand disappeared with the incoming tide.
meanings.sent5: The fadednesses of the memories slowly drifted away with time.
